Package controller

Class Add_Photo

java.lang.Object
util.Controller
controller.Add_Photo
public class Add_Photo extends Controller
Controls the "Add_Photo" stage This class manages the addition of a photo to an album. It allows the user to select a photo file, specify a caption, and add the photo to the album.
Author:
xxxx, yyyy

      primaryStage - is the Stage that this controller controls
      currUser - is the current User that's accessing this stage
